timeline.august2018: Graduated as Biosystems Engineer, University of Sao Paulo
timeline.april2020: Completed Women Can Code program, transitioning into tech
timeline.june2020: Joined Venturus as Junior Frontend Developer
timeline.december2021: Promoted to Mid-Level Frontend Developer at Venturus
timeline.june2022: Built an internal tool to streamline workflows using JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, and CSS
timeline.october2023_1: Earned Post-Graduate Certification in Software Engineering
timeline.october2023_2: Rebuilt and scaled the internal tool using React, SCSS, and Firebase
timeline.march2024: Trained and mentored a new web developer, solidifying the team’s capabilities

list.title: Internal Web Application for Farfetch
list.description: Developed an internal web application to replace a spreadsheet-based process at Farfetch.
list.responsibilities: Initially built the application using vanilla JavaScript. Rebuilt with React and SCSS as the application scaled. Integrated backend services using Firebase. Currently leading training for a new web developer.
list.stack: JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, CSS, React, SCSS, Firebase

list.title: Frontend Development at Venturus
list.description: Worked on multiple projects as part of a Scrum and later a SAFe-based team at Venturus.
list.responsibilities: Developed and maintained frontend applications using React, Redux, and TypeScript. Interacted with REST APIs and ensured code quality through reviews and testing using Jest and Cypress.
list.stack: React, Redux, TypeScript, REST APIs, Jest, Cypress

list.title: Financial API
list.description: A personal project published on RapidAPI that fetches data for stocks and cryptocurrencies.
list.responsibilities: Designed and implemented the API using FastAPI and Python. Enhanced functionality to stand out in the market. This was my first experience with Python, where I learned about API design, data fetching, and error handling.
list.challenges: Faced challenges with learning Python syntax and best practices, implementing efficient data fetching, and ensuring robust error handling.

list.title: BuddyMinder
list.description: Developed a Chrome extension based on a personal idea to help users memorize key information.
list.responsibilities: Developed the extension based on a personal idea to improve memory retention and learning. Designed a sleek and user-friendly interface using React and SCSS. Integrated Firebase for data synchronization and cross-platform functionality. Added multilingual support (i18n) for English, French, Spanish, and Portuguese.
list.challenges: Overcame challenges with Chrome Extension APIs, ensuring seamless notifications and efficient data management. Managed integration with Firebase for real-time updates.
list.stack: React, SCSS, Ant Design, Chrome Extension APIs

legend.favorites: My absolute favorites and main area of expertise
legend.comfortable: I feel comfortable, but need occasional brushing up
legend.improving: I’ve worked with these but still improving
legend.learning: On my way! Just starting out
